document_data.name: Frites
document_data.othernames:
Fries{{Cite adventurers league/The Swarmed Heart|10}}
Chips
Fried Potatoes
document_data.mainbody: '''Frites''' or '''fries''', sometimes called '''chips''', was a simple [[potato]] dish found around the [[Western Heartlands]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Frites were thickly cut wedges of potato, that were fried in [[beef]] [[tallow]]. Sometimes, potatoes were doused in flavoring agents, such as [[garlic butter]] and [[lemon]]. Some people claimed that this dish's taste reminded them of "leisurely promenades along partially frozen rivers."
document_data.Availability:
Fried potatoes were on the menu of the [[Wandering Emporium]] in [[Avernus]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR, seven as a side dish for fried [[merfolk]] fillets.

Frites were commonly seen in eateries and campfires across the Western Heartlands in [[West Faer√ªn]], the city of [[Scornubel]], as well as in the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] on the [[Sword Coast]]. Fried potatoes were served doused in [[mustard]] sauce in [[Neverwinter]]'s [[The Board Laid Bare]] eatery. Further inland, fried potatoes were available in the city of [[Westgate]] on the [[Dragon Coast]]. Frites were served with a morningfeast plates of steak and bacon aboard some ships that sailed out of [[Waterdeep]], and in the [[Tethyrian]] city of [[Velen]], pan-fried potatoes were served tossed in garlic, lemon, and [[oil]].
